page.title: 10Penygloddfa School
page.content: Penygloddfa when traslated into English means 'Top of the quarry'.We have a junior,infant and nursery department.The school is sited on three levels wich means there is a lot of walking up_hill.The juniors have to walk about a 150 metres to get to our assembly hall.There are approximately 285 pupils in the school altogether, 106 infants,154 juniors and 25 in the nursery class.There are 13 teachers,a nursery helper and a general helper, and a Headmaster.We have a canteen staff who provide snacks and lunches,a care_taker,and cleaning staff.School begins at 9 a.m. and ends at 3:20 p.m. for the infants and 3:30 p.m. for the juniors.We have a break of 1 and a quater hours for lunch and a morning and afternoon of 15 minutes each.We walk to Dolerw park for our games.
